comment: Professor Coleman cares so much about his students. He is passionate about KSU and hopes to help guide students in the right direction. 10/10 would recommend

Enjoy going to class, vey funning and makes the material interesting. He seems to slack on the grading a bit and how D2L functions. Something on D2L will say it is due but he never mentions the project and what it actually is. Therefore, not quiet sure if and when assignments are actually due. I would take him again
Professor Coleman was helpful and made me laugh a lot. The subject matter is pretty boring but he made it fun. Easy to talk but very strict on deadlines.
